content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### Electricity Generator at position (x)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position not specified)
- Boiler (position not specified)
- Offshore pump (position not specified)

### Copper Plate Mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace at position (not specified)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace at position (not specified)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace at position (not specified)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure that you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory before attempting to use furnaces or other crafting entities.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for any existing entities in the intended position.

### Errors related to crafting limitations
- Regularly check your inventory and crafting capabilities to ensure you have the required resources to craft items.
